snippet: A machete-wielding man attacked an American tourist couple as they walked along a remote beach on Grenada, killing the woman.
lead_paragraph: A machete-wielding man attacked an American tourist couple as they walked along a remote beach on Grenada, killing the woman.
abstract: Man wielding machete attacks tourist couple on remote Grenada beach, killing Jessica Lewis Colker; police are searching for motive.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Grenada: Assailant Kills U.S. Tourist
